snippet: A report by Roger Bootle and economists at Capital Economics in London was the winning entry in a contest to develop a solution to the euro zone crisis.
abstract: Report by Roger Bootle and economists at Capital Economics in London is the winning entry in a contest to develop a solution to the euro zone crisis; prize in contest sponsored by Simon Wolfson is 250,000 pounds, or $388,000.
lead_paragraph: A report by Roger Bootle and economists at Capital Economics in London was the winning entry in a contest to develop a solution to the euro zone crisis.

headline.seo: Hypothetical Scheme for a Graceful Euro Zone Exit Wins Economics Prize
headline.main: Spinning a Scene of Euro Zone's Disintegration
headline.print_headline: Plan for a Graceful Euro Zone Exit Wins Economics Prize
